meaningMnemonic: You only have a <radical>few</radical> <radical>eye</radical>s so you need to <kanji>conserve</kanji> what's left.
readingMnemonic: You're trying to <kanji>conserve</kanji> your eyes, when the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう) marches by. He stops, sees you, and demands you give him your remaining eyes! But sir, I'm conserving what little I have left!
